Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.blob.ali

Class AliBlobClient

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.blob.driver.AbstractBlobClient<AliBlobClient>
com.salesforce.multicloudj.blob.ali.AliBlobClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider, SdkService, AutoCloseable
public class AliBlobClient extends AbstractBlobClient<AliBlobClient>
An implementation of the AbstractBlobClient for Ali OSS AliBlobClient is service client for interacting with Alibaba Cloud Blob Storage.

This class provides methods to access Ali resources using Alibaba OSS JDK to interact with the OSS service.
